channel.title: Comments on: Oliver Roy and same sex marriages.
channel.description: notes on Jewish theology and spirituality

item.title: By: AS
item.dc:creator: AS
item.description:
I believe that something along these lines happened, but "Flatbush Chassidishe rebbe" doesn't make sense on a number of levels.
There are certainly plenty of rebbeshe types in Flatbush who have shtiebels, some of whom probably were never ordained formally or informally, but very few actual chassidishe rebbes.
item.content:encoded:
I believe that something along these lines happened, but “Flatbush Chassidishe rebbe” doesn’t make sense on a number of levels.

There are certainly plenty of rebbeshe types in Flatbush who have shtiebels, some of whom probably were never ordained formally or informally, but very few actual chassidishe rebbes.
